product_description: How to Use: Adjust the seat to the "free slide" position (spring-lock seat pin unlocked), remove the handles, connect the desired amount of resistance, sit on the seat, and place the Leg Press strap around your hips. Slide forward to the pulley and place your feet in the left and right openings under the pulley. Attach the belt to the cable and tighten the adjustment straps on the belt by pulling until the belt is tight. Put your hands on the vertical main frame and push your body backward while placing your feet (one at a time) on the non-slip pads on the pulley frame. Grab the belt near where it connects to the cable and begin to push backward.

name: TreadLife Fitness LegPress/Rowing Strap Compatible with most Bowflex Gyms
short_description: The Strap is Heavy Duty and can be used on the highest rod setting
The Leg Press Belt is Compatible with most Bowflex models
product_description: Using The Leg Press Belt: The Leg Press Belt is Compatible with most Bowflex models and the Seated Hamstring Curl exercises. With the seat adjusted to the 'free sliding' position, (spring lock seat pin unlocked) the hand grips removed, and the desired amount of resistance hooked up, sit on the seat and position the leg press belt around your hips. Slide forward to the pulleys and place your feet through the right and left openings under the pulleys. Attach the belt to the cables and cinch the adjustment strap on the belt by pulling the strap until the belt is tight. Place hands on vertical main frame and push yourself back while placing feet (one at a time), onto nonskid pads on pulley frame. Grab belt near where it's attached to the cables and begin pressing back.
